title: Bullet Sound FX - Ultimate Collection
description: Top-notch bullet SFX bundling 32 different materials! BEST VALUE & FREE BONUS SOUNDS!
longDescription:
Introducing: Bullet Sound FX - Ultimate Collection

$199.66 $149.99! ($49.67 SAVINGS!)


LISTEN TO PREVIEW HERE


Looking for bullet sound effects? Look no further!


Bullet Sound FX - Ultimate Collection is the gold standard for bullet sound effects and the flagship collection of the series.


This must-have comprehensive sound effects library features every bullet sound effect you could possibly need, from impacts on various materials to whizz and ricochet sounds.


This flagship collection contains all of the products of the series with a whopping 1300 sounds, including bullet impact sounds for 32 different materials:


  1. Wood 1 (wooden plank)
  2. Wood 2 (tree trunk)
  3. Wood 3 (shattering)
  4. Wood 4 (generic)
  5. Metal 1 (heavy)
  6. Metal 2 (sheet metal)
  7. Metal 3 (armor plate)
  8. Metal 4 (Steel)
  9. Dirt 1
  10. Dirt 2
  11. Gravel
  12. Ice
  13. Snow
  14. Shallow Water
  15. Deep Water
  16. Underwater
  17. Sand
  18. Mud
  19. Grass
  20. Vegetation / Leaves
  21. Concrete / Tarmac
  22. Rock
  23. Glass 1 (breakable)
  24. Glass 2 (breakable)
  25. Glass 3 (bulletproof)
  26. Glass 4 (windshield)
  27. Flesh
  28. Guts
  29. POV Character Hit
  30. Soft Material (cloth)
  31. Chain Link Fence
  32. Tiles / Ceramic


FREE BONUS: 40 top-quality whizz (bullet fly-by) sounds!


Crafted to perfection with meticulous attention to detail, these sound effects are designed to fully immerse the player in the action.Â 


Unparalleled in quality, volume, and consistency of the sound effects, this sound collection is the go-to choice for top-notch bullet sound effects, which makes it the unbeatable choice for any project involving firearms, guns and weapons.


This collection is part of a series and bundles sounds from other products of the series, available individually HERE!

Apart from containing original sounds only available in this product, it also bundles sounds from these products at a DISCOUNTED PRICE (incredible value!):


Bullet Sound FX - Metal Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Dirt Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Glass Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Hard Impact Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Water Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Flesh Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Wilderness Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Wood Bundle
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 1300

Sample rate: 44,100 Hz

Bit depth: 24 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 21m38s


To use this product, please import the files into your project and use a triggering

script / method of your choice. No special software required.
